title: Betplay Group
author: Betplay Group
content: You can now enjoy your favorite games using XRP and BUSD on Betplay.io!Ripple (XRP) and Binance USD are two new cryptocurrencies we've introduced for an even more exhilarating gaming experience (BUSD). And we have something unique for you to increase the joy and excitement even further. For every 10 EUR/USD you deposit in XRP and BUSD, you will get an entry into a randomized raffle with over 500 USD that will be paid out on 1st November.Â More coins will be added soon! The fun never ends here on Betplay.io Keep safe!-Betplay.io Team
